Package org.mapsforge.android.maps.inputhandling

Class Summary
MapMover A MapMover moves the map horizontally and vertically at a configurable speed.
MultiTouchHandler Implementation for multi-touch capable devices.
SingleTouchHandler Implementation for single-touch capable devices.
TouchEventHandler Abstract base class for the single-touch and the multi-touch handler.
ZoomAnimator A ZoomAnimator handles the zoom-in and zoom-out animations of the corresponding MapView.
